categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Silver" was the nickname of a clone trooper captain who commanded a Pelta-class frigate. Silver rescued the survivors from the explosion on board the Venator-class Star Destroyer Endurance. He was waiting for Anakin Skywalker and Mace Windu to give the word on Admiral Shoan Kilian and Commander Ponds. However, he was later told there was no sign of Kilian or Ponds in the wreckage and to leave by Anakin Skywalker and Mace Windu. He then transported the survivors to the near by medical station.
